commit_message: Initial commit
add license and planning notes
consider other factions' units in decoherence algorithm

use SlimDX instead of Managed DX
format modDX a little nicer
add license headers
correctly check for changed keys
update planning notes
draw selection box, add game structures
reorganize folders, other small changes
fix bugs in fixed point operations

add some random notes
try to load json (doesn't work)
draw hardcoded map, allow moving camera
right click to move
left click to select, don't draw select box for now
remove test image code
init multiple matter types (press C to switch which one is controlled)

only add/remove changed tiles instead of regenerating every frame
add matter-keyed fog of war tiles
add pausing and rewinding
mark 'coherent' tiles

allow giving commands in past\!

update todo in notes.txt
write readme

edit readme and various minor updates

start implementing amplitudes (not fully integrated with time travel yet)

draw lines between amplitudes

implement attacking

undo making all units blue

remove di (direct input) variable prefixes
rename some variables in DX.cs
fix some bugs when deleting amplitudes

This reverts commit a2523a503816906a673fc6d119f9fd656c334794 because there
was too much of a performance hit.
